name: Save Space
description:
Save Space  - Protect the Freedom of Earth 

  • Developed using Unity 3D 2018.2
  • 16:9 Ratio 
  • Open Source Project , you can find the project on Github (@sudarakas)
  • Released by LulzDev 

How to play

  • Use Arrow Keys to Move
  • Use Space Bar for Shooting

Available on Windows and Android  

- NanoLabs -
